name: onfido-sdk-core
description: JavaScript SDK core for identity verification

scripts.test:cov: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover $(npm bin)/_mocha -- --recursive
scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/onfido-core.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/onfido.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && node ./build/es3ify
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g reactjs/onfido
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:reactjs/onfido gh-pages --force
